right.description: Did video editing and graphic design for promotional videos, billboards and social media artcards as a creative to help with our clients' needs.
Helped with the creative department back at iACADEMY with tasks such as video editing, event coverage and set management for photoshoots.
Lead artist, script director and project manager for a capstone project where we created a 120 page one-shot webtoon comic depicting the issues in WPS.
Did digital painting and illustration commissions ranging from Twitch emotes, Webtoon coloring, and fanarts.
